scripts.dbbackup: docker exec -it database bash -c 'pg_dump -U directus -W -F t directus > ./backup/database_dump.pg'
scripts.start: cd database && docker-compose up -d && cd ../cms && docker-compose up -d
scripts.stop: cd cms && docker-compose down && cd ../database && docker-compose down && npx kill-port 8080
scripts.clean: cd database && docker-compose down --rmi all --volumes --remove-orphans && docker-compose up -d && cd ../cms docker-compose down --rmi all --volumes --remove-orphans && docker-compose up -d
scripts.dbrestore: docker exec -it database bash -c 'pg_restore -U directus --clean --no-owner --no-acl --dbname=directus ./backup/dev_database_backup.pg' && docker compose down && docker compose up -d
scripts.frontend: cd frontend && nohup npm run serve > /dev/null 2>&1 &
